name: Robo Meltdown
description:
Robo meltdown is a story about a robot tasked with saving his creators. Many years ago they were trapped under a form of snow. They had seen this coming and had prepared counter measures but they were too late! 

In Robo meltdown you suddenly wake up and will finish the task you were created to do.

Robo Melt-down is part of the UE4 Spring jam and was created in 1 day.
You can watch the entire development on the twitch vod: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/645606966

Many assets were used and I decided to focus on the gameplay, blueprinting and placing everything together. I also used a the synty interior demo map from the polygon scifi space pack in the main level.
